Requirements You just used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.zJ3Jakto3oqJTLZR]{Limit Break} action.

Area @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]

Clouds of darkness emanate from around you, filling the area with a sense of overarching dread. You may make a [[/act demoralize]] attempt against each enemy in the area, ignoring the usual requirements that the creature be able to understand you, using your highest skill modifier in place of Intimidation. If you do still use Intimidation, you gain a +1 untyped bonus to your check per Limit Rank.

Additionally, enemies do not become immune to your demoralize attempts from using Tenebrae Lemurum, no matter the result.
